Module org.calcmvc
Package org.calcmvc.common.operation

Class CalcCommonBase

java.lang.Object
org.calcmvc.common.misc.MyConcreteObservable
org.calcmvc.common.operation.CalcCommonBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyCommand, MyObservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CalcController, CalcModel, CalcView
public abstract class CalcCommonBase extends MyConcreteObservable implements MyCommand
This class handles all the [CommonBase] elements of the same type.
Author:
x. skapin

    • createOpElements

      protected void createOpElements(Package thePackage, OperandType operandType, Class<? extends CommonBase> theClass)
      Creates all classes related to a specific operand type and located inside a given package
      Parameters:
      thePackage - package containing the classes to create
      operandType - type of the operand used in the global calculator
      theClass - class representing the instance to create
